Proposal.title: Proposal Quote/ Development
Proposal.description: e.g. Proposal/ project admin e.g. SF, contract/ SOW, signing uploading etc.

ResearchDesign.title: Research Design
ResearchDesign.description: e.g. Sampling framework, experimental design, modelling input etc.

QuestionnaireGuide.title: Questionnaire/ Discussion and Recruitment Guide
QuestionnaireGuide.description: e.g. Writing of Q, testing, changes, re-testing. Includes qualitative recruitment and discussion guides

PilotingPreTesting.title: Interviewing/ Pre-testing/ Piloting
PilotingPreTesting.description: e.g. Covers any pre-testing for quant. Also includes qualitative fieldwork including moderation

DeskResearch.title: Secondary/ Desk Research
DeskResearch.description: (Includes Finalisation of Report Template, Topline Report, Final Report etc.)

CSPM.title: CS Project Management
CSPM.description: e.g. All project related management e.g. holecount checks, invites for client sample, sample matrix, weighting

DataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
DataAnalysis.description: e.g. Tabspecs, data table checking and report data analysis. Also for Qualitative

ReportPrep.title: Presentation/ Workshops
ReportPrep.description: e.g. Report template, charting, chart checking, report writing, topline summary, final report etc. Presentation preparation
